text: The Langtang National Park is a national park in Nepal. In 1976, area was changed into this national park. It is the first Himalayan national park. There are 14 types of vegetations in 18 types of ecosystems in this national park.Bhuju, U. R., Shakya, P. R., Basnet, T. B., Shrestha, S. (2007). Nepal Biodiversity Resource Book. Protected Areas, Ramsar Sites, and World Heritage Sites . International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development, Ministry of Environment, Science and Technology, in cooperation with United Nations Environment Programme, Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific. Kathmandu, ==References== Category:National parks of Nepal
title: Langtang National Park
